li.a: Senior Class - Information You Need to Know

div.p:
Our Mission is...
To make certain that our children are prepared to transition successfully from high school to advanced schooling, the military or work with the knowledge and skills necessary for responsible citizenship and life-long learning.

div.div: Markesan District Schools will be closed beginning Monday, March 16, 2020 and will remain closed for the duration of the public health emergency or until a subsequent order lifts this restriction.
